::: {#hero-heading}

Doctoral candidate at the Technical University of Munich with a clinical medicine background and research experience in wound healing, skin biology, and translational dermatology. Current work also includes bioinformatics and GWAS research.

## Education

- **Technical University of Munich** - Doctor Candidate (09/2023-Present)
- **Jilin University** - Master Degree, Clinical Medicine (09/2020-07/2023)
- **Jilin University** - Bachelor Degree, Clinical Medicine (09/2015-07/2020)

## Research and Clinical Experience

- **Resident training in Plastic Surgery, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich** (10/2025-Present)  
  Focused on reduction mammoplasty, abdominoplasty, and fat grafting. Participating in clinical studies on: 1) complication rates across capsule excision techniques in breast reduction; 2) perioperative effects of prophylactic intravenous tranexamic acid in abdominoplasty.
- **Bioinformatics and GWAS research on androgenetic alopecia and alopecia areata, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich** (04/2025-2026)  
  Conducting multi-omics integration and genetic association analyses to identify candidate pathways and potential therapeutic targets.
- **Comparative efficacy study of hypoxia-preconditioned serum (HPS) vs platelet-rich plasma (PRP), Plastic Surgery Laboratory, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich** (05/2024-10/2025)  
  Evaluating HPS versus PRP and exploring translational applications of HPS in regenerative medicine.
- **Bioinformatics and GWAS research training, Helmholtz Munich** (10/2023-06/2024)  
  Completed structured training in bioinformatics and genome-wide association analysis, with emphasis on genetic epidemiology workflows and interpretation.

:::
